Introduction

Eunchan is a South Korean singer and actor under Yue Hua Entertainment.

On January 3, 2022, Eunchan was revealed as the sixth member of Yue Hua Entertainment's upcoming boy group TEMPEST. He debuted as a member of the group on March 2, 2022, with the release of their first mini album titled "It's ME, It's WE".

Eunchan made his debut as an actor in 2025 as a supporting role in KBS2's drama "Villains Everywhere", which aired from March 19 to April 24, 2025.
